data.text:
Karen S.T.E. Gaudet’s Post

Transformational Executive

4y Edited

I am excited to share my book #SteadyWork will launch on February 17th. I was given the opportunity to write about my journey at #Starbucks while leading the spread of #LeanThinking. I am proud to share with you, all of the tremendous work done by my team and so many others. I hope through sharing this story the learning will help other leaders who are on the path to transforming the business, their work and serving the people who do the work.#SteadyWork,#Starbucks,#Leadership,#LeanThinking
